scripts.debug_Old: export SLS_DEBUG=* && node --inspect-brk aws sls invoke local -s dev
scripts.debug: export SLS_DEBUG=* && node --inspect aws sls invoke local -s dev
scripts.build: npm run build:mjs && npm run build:cjs
scripts.usefulCommands:
'{ 
      "compile": "tsc",
      "test": "jest",
      "unit": "jest",
      "lint": "eslint '*.ts' --quiet --fix",
      "build": "esbuild src/handlers/s3DropBucket.ts --bundle --minify --out-extension:.js=.mjs --external: 'aws-sdk, @aws-sdk/client-s3, node-fetch, @aws-sdk/protocol-http' --platform: nodejs20.x --target=es2020 --outdir=.aws-sam/build/",
      "build2": "esbuild src/handlers/s3DropBucket.ts --bundle --minify --out-extension:.js=.mjs --sourcemap --platform: nodejs20.x --target=es2020 --outdir=src/handlers/",
      "build3": "esbuild src/handlers/s3DropBucket.ts --bundle --minify --out-extension:.js=.mjs --sourcemap --platform: nodejs20.x --target=es2020 --outdir=src/handlers/",
      "build4": "esbuild ./src/handlers/s3DropBucket.ts --out-extension:.js=.mjs --external:'node_modules/aws-sdk/clients/s3.js' --bundle --minify --platform: nodejs20.x --target=es2020 --outfile=./src/handlers/s3DropBucket.mjs",
      "watch": "tsc -w"
    }'
